tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: You can't have a winning smile without a winning team of professionals. Dr. Surendra and Dr.Radhika have created a dental spa practice worthy of celebratory praise. After searching for Dentist in Google I stumbled upon Shambhala. I scheduled an appointment for Zoom (teeth whitening) and met Dr. Radhika, a beautiful woman with a personality to suit. She was personable and informative on many topics related to cosmetic dentistry and dental maintenance.She was courteous and thoroughly educated that I immediately felt I needed to become a regular patient. With a problematic crown, I consulted with Dr.Surendra and Dr.Radhika who worked seamlessly together. They operated the dental practice with a spa-like quality which was calming, tranquil and efficient.  Dental treatments should be worry free and the environment of the procedures should support positive influences and negate stressors. They have reached a level of mastery that is needed and welcomed . This entire team from reception and finance  and dental examination is flawless. You'll receive a winning smile without undue stress or dental anxiety when you choose these professionals. Get you smile together at Shambhala Dental Spa and Wholeness
reply_text: Thank you so much for kind gesture

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
As soon as you walk in, the place makes you feel very positive, welcomed and comfortable. The hygienist was absolutely amazing. The entire staff was very friendly, honest, and extremely knowledgeable.
Any questions that I had as well as any procedure done was explained in terms that I could understand. 
I found SHAMBHALA as the UNIQUE care which amalgamates professionalism and the most important thing ETHICS all together. In short, SHAMBALA with all its devoted staff members is the true place of panacea. Special thanks to the professionalism of Dr. Surendra and Dr. Radhika. Cheers!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Radhika has been splendid in explaining the cause, also carefully understands and resolves any issues with the teeth. My dental cleaning got done in no time and I must say that I have thoroughly enjoyed the procedure. I think she is one of the very few doctors who been so down to earth and understands every patients issue. 

A follow up call and checking her patient about how he/she is doing is very rare which I see from Radhika. Cheers to you, Radhika!! Hope to get back to you for any dental issue.. üòÅüòÅüòÅüòòüòò

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: The staff has always been welcoming and professional, yet personable. The clinic is clean, well maintained and they seem to use the latest equipment available. Dr. Surendra and Dr. Radhika are extremely good to talk to. They provide good consultation and explain the procedures neatly. Genuinely the best dental service I've ever received. Would highly recommend this to anyone in need. Especially Root Canal procedure. Mine was done perfectly with zero discomfort.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind gesture.
